name: Tim Kirby
text: Great company to work for.

name: Alegna smada
text: Love the owners

name: Jerry Duncan
text: Good bus company

name: KeSean Williams
text: They

name: Wanda Smith
text: I've NEVER used the public transportation bus, so I CAN'T comment on public transportation

name: Amanda Riker
text: The bus driver named Cindy is always so nice and professional. She always goes out of her way to help people.

name: Jessica Mcclure
text: Its a great way to get around safely and get to learn the Anniston and Oxford areas.

name: James Williams
text: The drivers for the bus line or rude!

name: Robert McGoey
text: Tiger Limousine is our go-to for special event transportation.  I have used the service for holiday tours of area Christmas lights and for special birthday dinners, and using Tiger Limo always enhances our enjoyment of the event.  The drivers are punctual and professional, and the service offers a good value for the price.   Highly recommend.

name: Dana Rogers
text: My husband rented a limo for our 25th anniversary. He wanted the night to be fabulous for us. We had a 2 hour drive to the restaurant we chose for the evening and decided it would be so nice to have a limo take us so we could enjoy our time together. When the limo came and we entered into the limo the car was disgusting. Apparently they had taken prom students over the weekend and our date was on Tuesday. It seems no one could clean the car between the the 2. The radio was broken the windows were all smeared up, glitter all over and the floors had mud on them. There was a knife with cake icing on it sticking out of the seat which in turn got icing on my dress. The driver was okay and drove very well  but the car was absolutely horrible. We were tempted to just cancel and drive ourselves but we had paid ahead of time and were afraid we wouldn’t get our money back.

name: Marianne McCarley
text: Tiger Limousine is the best service in the Auburn area. We've used them for years. Brett always takes care of us. He's courteous and always has an interesting story for us. Would recommend!

name: Marianne McCarley
text: I love this company, and rave about it every chance I get! Very professional and always go the extra mile as they did for my birthday party. This company is my go-to for all my family’s special events in Auburn/ Opelika!

name: Sam Cooper
text: Great service. A lot cheaper than the other companies I called. I would recommend this company because of how easy it was to book.

name: Bobby Lancaster
text: Great limo service.  Provided us with charter buses to transport our guests then a nice get away limo for the bride and groom. On time and clean.

name: Mifune's Life
text: Want to give a  BIG thanks to Paul, our driver for his patience!!  Would request him next time!!

name: Glenn Robertson
text: Professional service. We rented a limo, shuttle bus, and horse and carriage from them. Everything was flawless.

name: Mackenzie Poole
text: Highly recommend Tiger Limousine! Kevin is very professional and they are extremely fair priced. Look no further for limousine services in the Auburn-Opelika area.

resp.text: Thank you for your kind words.  We hope we can be of service to you in the future. Thank you for your business.

name: Ben Hagin
text: The driver of the limo went beyond what I expected him to do. Usually they just open the door but he helped us with a few things in the wedding. Use David if you can.

name: Linda McLaughlin Johnson
text: Not real friendly, expensive 15$ for a 1.5 mile ride.

name: Hay Dawk
text: This crook overcharged me $30 for 1.3 miles .once I made it to my truck the taxi driver became aggressive in a threatening tone saying to stay in his taxi until I pay him.I asked him ,how was I going to pay him if I need to grabbed the money out the truck .this guy is a crook and violent and should not be trusted unless you want him to con you out your money and make you feel unsafe while riding with him.he looks homeless and like he sleep in his vehicle

name: Shelli Rimes
text: We had a wonderful trip to Orlando with Kelton. From our relay driver, Melanie, to our main driver, Charlie, I couldn’t be happier with the quality of service we received. Drivers were friendly, helpful, and safe. I’ve never had a driver in all my years of teaching that went above and beyond as Charlie did for us. Outstanding service! The bus was clean, in great shape, with outlets on every seat. The AC worked evenly throughout the bus. Can not say enough good things about my experience. Thank you!

name: Dixie Phillips
text: Great service, safe and friendly drivers! Very impressed will book for next trip! Thank you Charley, Melanie and Raymond!

name: KE'UNDRE' L WHITE
text: Charlie wad GREAT!! He was such a great driver if i & i would always choose him to drive our bus loved it

name: Don Leonard
text: I had such a pleasant and fun time with our bus driver (John). I felt more than welcome and would recommend them for all your traveling needs.

name: Ashley Lee
text: Charlie wad GREAT!! He was such a gentleman. He went above and beyond to make sure we were comfortable throughout our trip!

name: Jonah Remz
text: I highly recommend to never use Kelton Tours. From dealing with the people working in the office to the poor quality of service of our round trip, I have never had as unpleasant an experience as I had with Kelton Tours. I would recommend finding just about any other bus company to use for your travel needs, as you will surely be disappointed if you use Kelton Tours.

name: Robby Flick
text: Great bunch of drivers that are professional and courteous.

name: John Shaw
text: I would strongly advise against this company. Chaperoned a field trip with my daughter’s school. The ride there was fine. The ride back however, was a nightmare. The driver frequently pulled to the side of the interstate and wouldn’t tell any of us why. Ended up that one of the 5 busses that was taking us home, had a broken A/C that was not found before leaving to take us. We ended up with a bus worth of children packed into an already full bus of screaming kids. Needless to say, I should’ve driven. Will never get on another one of their busses. Was ridiculous. Only giving two stars because the trip there was ok. Otherwise, it would be one star. Avoid this company unless it’s a last resort.

name: Pascal Moon
text: Best Charter Bus company ever owner retired

name: Nell Holmes
text: Trip to Gatlinburg was great. Our driver Ken was 100% the best. Professional and courteous,  skilled at his job. We certainly enjoyed it.

name: Nina Demby
text: The staff was very helpful and friendly.  They us updated on everything they did for us.

name: Ashley Bowman
text: I have chartered a bus each year from Southern Coaches (for the past 8 years) and have never been disappointed.  I've never experienced a bad driver, but in my opinion, the best one is Mr. Larry Mitchell.  If you want a great trip, ask for him!  He has always been a safe driver who is very friendly and professional.  I also appreciate his positive attitude and his confidence in driving the motor coach.  Keep up the great work, Southern Coaches!

name: Agnes Logue
text: Labor day.trip with driver. Ken . to Pigeon Forge.  Wonderful trip.

name: Cathy Belcher
text: I have used Southern Coaches for more than 25 years, and they have never disappointed.   We can confidently recommend them to our clients, and whenever we have an escorted trip, they are our first choice in motorcoach companies. We have been in situations where inclement weather has impacted the normal schedule, and they have been adaptable, and have never let us down.   Any of their drivers are great, but Al Skipper is the driver that my repeat clients ask for.  It's comforting as a travel agent to have 100% confidence in subcontracting out transportation, and John, the owner, has an impeccable reputation for running an honest and safe company.

name: karen strickland
text:
Our driver
,Ken was excellent, kind and attentive to all.

name: Chris Taylor
text: I had a bad experience with a driver at Southern Coach Bus over the weekend . Driver hit my car that was parked clearly out the road but Driver told his owner that I was ILLEGALLY  parked but o have photos to prove otherwise that I can upload. For the driver to falsely accuse me of parking ILLEGALLY just own up to your mistake and admit that you was in the wrong and wasn't paying attention... Photos of my Green Crown vic ILLEGALLY parked which Southern Coach driver hit.....

name: Pop's Garage
text: A premier charter coach company that puts the customers needs first.

name: kelly wolf
text: Awesome and friendly

name: KEITH JEWELL Straight-Line PARKING LOT MAINTENANCE
text: Keeping the money local

name: Gary Clark
text: Very nice motor coach company. Drivers are friendly buses are clean and sanitized. Owners are hands on and treat everyone with respect.

name: Yolanda Jordan
text: I have used this company on many occasions. Everything from church trips to family functions, picnics etc. They always go above and beyond to make everything comfortable and accessible to everyone from the elderly to expecting mothers. The drivers are very respectful and courteous. Thanks Mr. R. Williams for rendering such superb services.

name: Sabrina Mccain Mccain
text: Great place to work. Very acommodating, pleaseant and comfortable traveling experience. Drivers are very experience and polite.

name: critical thinking wide range of topics
text:
A great experience!!!
Everyone should use southeastern motor coach, randy and the guys are top of the class in bus charter... Thank you for your hospitality :)

name: Elder Cedric L. King
text: Awesome  company!!

name: George Upshaw
text: Very good equipment very professional

name: Paul Goldsmith
text: Ive been with GCT since 2015, it has been a pleasure being a operator for this company.The owners,staff,and all vehicles are the top of the line, well maintained, and give you all the comforts especially on long trips. I am biased but GCT is know for its reputation and quality of service in the southeast and beyond. There is no better tour operator GCT in Mobile and surrounding communities.

name: Tierney Collier
text: My daughter had a school field trip booked to go to Orlando, but due to the COVID-19 the trip was canceled. Granted that their policy states that the payment is non-refundable, I feel that they should have still reimbursed the students because no one personally canceled their trip. Gulf Coast Tours should have reimbursed the students in full.

name: Deb Harlan
text: The lady at Gulf Coast Tours told us to meet in Daphne and the bus took off from Spanish Fort for the ALA v LSU game.  Now my husband has to drive to Tuscaloosa. Why wouldn't the driver have names and phone numbers of passengers so the they could at least give a courtesy call or text to missing individuals on the manifest?  Extremely poor service.  Will definitely be diaputing this charge on my credit card.

name: Merrill Whitener
text: This tour is a must!  Arthur is so knowledgeable and Oliver his little Scottish Terrier who rides along on every tour is adorable.  Well worth the $15.  I saw several places I am going back to explore.  We went off season, so we could not get off and back on.  I moved across the bay to Daphne a while ago and learned so much!

name: Lera Day
text: We hired a trolley for my daughter’s wedding. Since the minimum time you can rent is 4 hours ($795) I was very clear that in addition to transporting wedding party from hotel to church and back to reception, I also wanted the trolley to take out of town guests and family from carnival museum to church and return .   The driver took the wedding party to the church and then stayed at the church.  By the time someone told me he was still there, the guests had paid for Uber to transport them to church.  They were unwilling to work with me about only performing half of the contract and offered me $100 refund .  The Uber rides were more than that not to mention upsetting the bride and several elderly family members.   Very disappointed.

name: Heide Cramer
text: My husband is a driver for Gulfcoast Tours. The owner, his wife and the whole staff are awesome.

name: Sharon Estelle
text: I attended a bus tour to Hattiesburg, MS and surrounding area on October 4th, 2018. We had a wonderful and relaxing time using Gulf Coast Tours. The bus was clean and in excellent condition. My only complaint was "No cup holders" .  Our driver, Marshall Freeman, was professional and an excellent driver. If I go on future tours with this group, I hope our driver is Marshall!

name: Francis West
text: Best drivers in the world!!!!!

name: Evan Johns
text: Went on a trip from Mobile to New Orleans with a Mardi gras krewe for St Patrick's day. The bus was an hour late picking us up and then had zero air conditioning for 50 people all the way back.worst charter experience I've ever had. I'd be embarrassed if I were this company.

name: Jason John Cruz
text:
Gulf Coast Tours makes me fell so valued as a customer ,Driver Ryan Franks is fantastic he goes the exta mile and cares so much road your bus miltion farm tours. The new MCI J45 buses are amzing, I always tell all my friends about Gul Cost Tours✌✌✌✌🙄😀

Jason

name: Charmaine Smith
text: These have to be the cleanest and most beautiful buses in the city.

name: Paul Dinkins
text: A great company to travel with for charters & tours.

name: Debra Sims
text: I love working at Gulf Coast Tour

name: Head Johnson
text: Good people there
